code.displayName: Relevant diagnostic tests and/or laboratory data

td.content: s:patient presents with Body Aches for more than 11 days. pt is a 22 yo F. o:Height 63 in, Weight 97 lbs, Temperature 98.5 F, Pulse 76, SystolicBP 107, DiastolicBP 68, Respiration 15 a:Lyme Disease p:performed E/M Level 2 (new patient) - Completed, and prescribed cefuroxime axetil - 500 mg 2x day, and ordered B. burgdorferi Ab in CSF.

s:a 22 year old F student c/o 2 weeks h/o Body Aches. NKDA. o:Height 63 in, Weight 98 lbs, Temperature 98.7 F, Pulse 83, SystolicBP 108, DiastolicBP 67, Respiration 15 a:Lyme Disease p:performed E/M Level 2 (established patient) - Completed, and prescribed cefuroxime axetil - 500 mg 2x day, and ordered B burgdorferi IgG Serum.
